// src/app/login/login.page.ts import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.page.html', styleUrls: ['./login.page.scss'], }) export class LoginPage { errorMessage: string | null = null; constructor(private router: Router) {} forgotPassword() { // Implement forgot password logic here console.log('Forgot password clicked'); } navigateToRegister() { this.router.navigate(['/register']); // Navigates to register page } } English Tea
